item.description: […] The Social Impact Track debuts at BVC next Thursday. There are four awesome companies pitching, including Bend’s own Sudara. I’m pretty excited to be on the panel, hear more from these inspiring founders and take part in this cool new track aimed at funding for-profit companies that also have a social/environmental mission. Hope to see you there. […]
item.content:encoded: […] The Social Impact Track debuts at BVC next Thursday. There are four awesome companies pitching, including Bend’s own Sudara. I’m pretty excited to be on the panel, hear more from these inspiring founders and take part in this cool new track aimed at funding for-profit companies that also have a social/environmental mission. Hope to see you there. […]
